opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 6th day of August, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal by the Benner Township Board of Supervisors is hereby GRANTED.
The Cross-Petition for Allowance of Appeal by the Levins is hereby GRANTED but LIMITED to the issue of preemption.
These matters are consolidated for argument.
Madame Justice Sandra Schultz Newman did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
